de.fhb.sailboat.control.navigator

Class ReachPolygonWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • de.fhb.sailboat.control.navigator.WorkerThread<ReachPolygonTask>
        • de.fhb.sailboat.control.navigator.ReachPolygonWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ReachPolygonWorker
extends WorkerThread<ReachPolygonTask>
    Calculates the relative angle from the current position to the centroid of the polygon defined in the task to be executed and hands it over to the pilot.
    Author:
    hscheel

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Calculates the angle towards the goal and hands it over to the pilot. Checks if beating is necessary.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • taskHasChanged

        protected void taskHasChanged()
        Description copied from class: WorkerThread
        Calculates everything necessary when the task to be executed has changed. This method is a hook for subclasses to add own calculations. Subclasses that need own calculations to be done when the task changed, should override this method and execute their calculations.
        Overrides:
        taskHasChanged in class WorkerThread<ReachPolygonTask>
